payload.text: Welcome! Thanks for meeting today to review the release plan. Absolutely, I'm excited to walk through the milestones. Let's start with the transcription experience and status syncing. Segment caching has been rock-solid since the recent fixes. Great. We'll capture remaining action items before we wrap up. Perfect, I'll follow up with documentation after this call.
